description: List time card invoices with filtering and pagination.

flags.description: Filter by invoice type (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: --invoice-type
flags.validation: Comma-separated invoice types; multiple values supported.

flags.description: Filter by invoice status (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: --invoice-status
flags.validation: Comma-separated statuses, e.g., approved. Valid values map to Invoice.statuses: editing, approved, sent, exported, rejected, batched, addressed, non_exportable, revisionable, revised.

flags.description: Filter by invoice seller ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: --seller
flags.validation: Comma-separated seller IDs; multiple values supported.

permissions: Requires an authenticated user with access to the related invoices via InvoicePolicy scope. Admins can view all; non-admins are limited to invoices where they are a member of the buyer customer (including management-service-type customer visibility), a manager member of the seller trucker, or a member of the broker.
validation_notes: shift-starts-after expects an ISO 8601 timestamp; it filters time-card invoices whose related tender job schedule shift start_at_cached is on/after the value. invoice-type, invoice-status, and seller accept comma-separated lists. invoice-status values must map to Invoice.statuses (editing, approved, sent, exported, rejected, batched, addressed, non_exportable, revisionable, revised); unknown statuses are ignored and may result in no matches if none are valid.
